article.name: Is it possible to monitor network devices?
article.title: Is it possible to monitor network devices?
article.body:
• Network devices can be monitored through use of the following monitoring plugins. (Only compatible with Linux OS)
    • mackerel-plugin-snmp
      • Retrieve arbitrary MIB information with SNMP and post as a metric.
      • SNMP Trap monitoring is not supported.
    • check-ping
      • Check ICMP communication and have alerts issued when interrupted.
  • Plugins must be installed on and configured for a host installed with the mackerel-agent.
    • It is not possible to monitor a network device by directly installing the mackerel-agent or plugin.
    • See Supported Environments for more details.
  • See the help page and the plugin README linked below for more details regarding the installation and configuration of plugins.
    • Using the official plugin pack to visualize middleware metrics - Mackerel Help
    • mackerel-agent-plugins/mackerel-plugin-snmp
    • go-check-plugins/check-ping
